mapper.select: SELECT /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.selectEvtFreeGiftInfo Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ EVT_NO , FREE_GIFT_TURN , PRIZE_RANK , FREE_GIFT_KND_CD , FREE_GIFT_NM , CPN_PRM_NO , PNT_AMT , WEBPNT_AMT , WEBPNT_USE_BEG_DT , WEBPNT_USE_END_DT , PRPARE_FREE_GIFT_QTY , FREE_GIFT_INV_QTY , PRIZE_QTY , BRND_ID , STMP_COUNT , ATEND_DAYCNT , REGTR_ID , REG_DT , UDTER_ID , UDT_DT FROM EVT_FREE_GIFT_INFO WHERE 1 = 1 AND EVT_NO = #{evtNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND FREE_GIFT_TURN = #{freeGiftTurn,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
